title: MyMedicalGuardian
description: Designed for use with all Medical Guardian brand medical alert systems, MyGuardian is a modern tool designed to connect caregivers with older adults. It allows you to keep older adults safe with care management features including but not limited to task reminders, activity alerts, location monitoring, and secure medical history/emergency contact storage. MyGuardian is also your client services portal, making it easy to pay bills and connect with Customer Care 24/7. For Customers and Caregivers:Manage Billing A timely, transparent billing dashboard Manage Care All the tools you need to give and receive care remotely, including activity planning & communication, group chats & more.System Status & Reports Monitor devices tied to your Medical Guardian account Download MyGuardian to effortlessly check-in with loved ones ageing in place today!

summary: Connect Caregivers & Older Adults Using Medical Guardian Medical Alert Systems
